Articles.Content:
Recently, I've noticed that the blackbody radiation effect is not fading away as it should, even after the parts have cooled to normal levels.

Here is a a spaceplane just after orbit and landing:

![BQynfcv.png](http://i.imgur.com/BQynfcv.png)

Here is the same plane one Kerbin day later:

![KHyJftO.png](http://i.imgur.com/KHyJftO.png)

Log files:

[http://www./view/9ath7tn66m6vc1w/output_log.txt](http://www./view/9ath7tn66m6vc1w/output_log.txt)

32 bit Windows KSP version 1.0.2

Mods installed:

Planetshine

Texture Replacer

Distant Object Enhancement

QuickSearch

MechJeb

HyperEdit
I have this issue too, but the only mod we have in common is QuickSearch. I highly doubt that's causing the problem though, so it might be a stock bug.
